verses.verse: הֵ֛ן <WH2005> Behold לֹֽא־ <WH3808> Nor קָצְרָ֥ה <WH7114> is not shortened יַד־ <WH3027> hand יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> the LORD'S מֵֽהוֹשִׁ֑יעַ <WH3467> that it cannot save וְלֹא־ <WH3808> Nor כָבְדָ֥ה <WH3513> heavy אָזְנ֖וֹ <WH241> neither his ear מִשְּׁמֽוֹעַ׃ <WH8085> that it cannot hear

כִּ֤י <WH3588> for אִם־ <WH518> but עֲוֹנֹֽתֵיכֶם֙ <WH5771> But your iniquities הָי֣וּ <WH1961> become מַבְדִּלִ֔ים <WH914> have separated בֵּינֵכֶ֕ם <WH996> between לְבֵ֖ין <WH996> between אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶ֑ם <WH430> you and your God וְחַטֹּֽאותֵיכֶ֗ם <WH2403> and your sins הִסְתִּ֧ירוּ <WH5641> have hid פָנִ֛ים <WH6440> [his] face מִכֶּ֖ם <WH4480> so מִשְּׁמֽוֹעַ׃ <WH8085> from you that he will not hear

כִּ֤י <WH3588> For כַפֵּיכֶם֙ <WH3709> For your hands נְגֹאֲל֣וּ <WH1351> are defiled בַדָּ֔ם <WH1818> with blood וְאֶצְבְּעוֹתֵיכֶ֖ם <WH676> and your fingers בֶּֽעָוֹ֑ן <WH5771> with iniquity שִׂפְתֽוֹתֵיכֶם֙ <WH8193> your lips דִּבְּרוּ־ <WH1696> have spoken שֶׁ֔קֶר <WH8267> lies לְשׁוֹנְכֶ֖ם <WH3956> your tongue עַוְלָ֥ה <WH5766> perverseness תֶהְגֶּֽה׃ <WH1897> hath muttered

אֵין־ <WH369> No קֹרֵ֣א <WH7121> None calleth בְצֶ֔דֶק <WH6664> for justice וְאֵ֥ין <WH369> one נִשְׁפָּ֖ט <WH8199> nor [any] pleadeth בֶּאֱמוּנָ֑ה <WH530> for truth בָּט֤וֹחַ <WH982> they trust עַל־ <WH5921> in תֹּ֙הוּ֙ <WH8414> in vanity וְדַבֶּר־ <WH1696> and speak שָׁ֔וְא <WH7723> lies הָר֥וֹ <WH2029> they conceive עָמָ֖ל <WH5999> mischief וְהוֹלֵ֥יד <WH3205> and bring forth אָֽוֶן׃ <WH205> iniquity

בֵּיצֵ֤י <WH1000> eggs צִפְעוֹנִי֙ <WH6848> cockatrice' בִּקֵּ֔עוּ <WH1234> They hatch וְקוּרֵ֥י <WH6980> web עַכָּבִ֖ישׁ <WH5908> the spider's יֶאֱרֹ֑גוּ <WH707> and weave הָאֹכֵ֤ל <WH398> he that eateth מִבֵּֽיצֵיהֶם֙ <WH1000> of their eggs יָמ֔וּת <WH4191> dieth וְהַזּוּרֶ֖ה <WH2116> and that which is crushed תִּבָּקַ֥ע <WH1234> breaketh out אֶפְעֶֽה׃ <WH660> into a viper

קֽוּרֵיהֶם֙ <WH6980> Their webs לֹא־ <WH3808> Nor יִהְי֣וּ <WH1961> become לְבֶ֔גֶד <WH899> shall not become garments וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> Nor יִתְכַּסּ֖וּ <WH3680> neither shall they cover בְּמַֽעֲשֵׂיהֶ֑ם <WH4639> themselves with their works מַֽעֲשֵׂיהֶם֙ <WH4639> their works מַֽעֲשֵׂי־ <WH4639> [are] works אָ֔וֶן <WH205> of iniquity וּפֹ֥עַל <WH6467> and the act חָמָ֖ס <WH2555> of violence בְּכַפֵּיהֶֽם׃ <WH3709> [is] in their hands

רַגְלֵיהֶם֙ <WH7272> Their feet לָרַ֣ע <WH7451> to evil יָרֻ֔צוּ <WH7323> run וִֽימַהֲר֔וּ <WH4116> and they make haste לִשְׁפֹּ֖ךְ <WH8210> to shed דָּ֣ם <WH1818> blood נָקִ֑י <WH5355> innocent מַחְשְׁבֽוֹתֵיהֶם֙ <WH4284> their thoughts מַחְשְׁב֣וֹת <WH4284> [are] thoughts אָ֔וֶן <WH205> of iniquity שֹׁ֥ד <WH7701> wasting וָשֶׁ֖בֶר <WH7667> and destruction בִּמְסִלּוֹתָֽם׃ <WH4546> [are] in their paths

דֶּ֤רֶךְ <WH1870> The way שָׁלוֹם֙ <WH7965> of peace לֹ֣א <WH3808> not יָדָ֔עוּ <WH3045> they know וְאֵ֥ין <WH369> and there מִשְׁפָּ֖ט <WH4941> not and [there is] no judgment בְּמַעְגְּלוֹתָ֑ם <WH4570> in their goings נְתִיבֽוֹתֵיהֶם֙ <WH5410> paths עִקְּשׁ֣וּ <WH6140> they have made them crooked לָהֶ֔ם <WH1992> like כֹּ֚ל <WH3605> Whoever דֹּרֵ֣ךְ <WH1869> whosoever goeth בָּ֔הּ לֹ֥א <WH3808> does not יָדַ֖ע <WH3045> therein shall not know שָׁלֽוֹם׃ <WH7965> peace

עַל־ <WH5921> and כֵּ֗ן <WH3651> after that רָחַ֤ק <WH7368> far מִשְׁפָּט֙ <WH4941> Therefore is judgment מִמֶּ֔נּוּ <WH4480> at וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> does not תַשִּׂיגֵ֖נוּ <WH5381> overtake צְדָקָ֑ה <WH6666> from us neither doth justice נְקַוֶּ֤ה <WH6960> us we wait לָאוֹר֙ <WH216> for light וְהִנֵּה־ <WH2009> behold חֹ֔שֶׁךְ <WH2822> but behold obscurity לִנְגֹה֖וֹת <WH5054> for brightness בָּאֲפֵל֥וֹת <WH653> in darkness נְהַלֵּֽךְ׃ <WH1980> [but] we walk

נְגַֽשְׁשָׁ֤ה <WH1659> We grope כַֽעִוְרִים֙ <WH5787> like the blind קִ֔יר <WH7023> for the wall וּכְאֵ֥ין <WH369> have עֵינַ֖יִם <WH5869> as if [we had] no eyes נְגַשֵּׁ֑שָׁה <WH1659> and we grope כָּשַׁ֤לְנוּ <WH3782> we stumble בַֽצָּהֳרַ֙יִם֙ <WH6672> at noonday כַּנֶּ֔שֶׁף <WH5399> as in the night בָּאַשְׁמַנִּ֖ים <WH820> [we are] in desolate כַּמֵּתִֽים׃ <WH4191> places as dead

נֶהֱמֶ֤ה <WH1993> We roar כַדֻּבִּים֙ <WH1677> all like bears כֻּלָּ֔נוּ <WH3605> All וְכַיּוֹנִ֖ים <WH3123> like doves הָגֹ֣ה <WH1897> and mourn נֶהְגֶּ֑ה <WH1897> sore נְקַוֶּ֤ה <WH6960> we look לַמִּשְׁפָּט֙ <WH4941> for judgment וָאַ֔יִן <WH369> there לִֽישׁוּעָ֖ה <WH3444> but [there is] none for salvation רָחֲקָ֥ה <WH7368> [but] it is far off מִמֶּֽנּוּ׃ <WH4480> at

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for רַבּ֤וּ <WH7235> abundance פְשָׁעֵ֙ינוּ֙ <WH6588> For our transgressions נֶגְדֶּ֔ךָ <WH5048> before וְחַטֹּאותֵ֖ינוּ <WH2403> before thee and our sins עָ֣נְתָה <WH6030> testify בָּ֑נוּ כִּֽי־ <WH3588> For פְשָׁעֵ֣ינוּ <WH6588> against us for our transgressions אִתָּ֔נוּ <WH854> for וַעֲוֹנֹתֵ֖ינוּ <WH5771> [are] with us and [as for] our iniquities יְדַֽעֲנֽוּם׃ <WH3045> we know

פָּשֹׁ֤עַ <WH6586> In transgressing וְכַחֵשׁ֙ <WH3584> and lying בַּֽיהוָ֔ה <WH3068> against the LORD וְנָס֖וֹג <WH5253> and departing away מֵאַחַ֣ר <WH310> from אֱלֹהֵ֑ינוּ <WH430> our God דַּבֶּר־ <WH1696> speaking עֹ֣שֶׁק <WH6233> oppression וְסָרָ֔ה <WH5627> and revolt הֹר֧וֹ <WH2029> conceiving וְהֹג֛וֹ <WH1897> and uttering מִלֵּ֖ב <WH3820> from the heart דִּבְרֵי־ <WH1697> words שָֽׁקֶר׃ <WH8267> of falsehood

וְהֻסַּ֤ג <WH5253> is turned away אָחוֹר֙ <WH268> backward מִשְׁפָּ֔ט <WH4941> And judgment וּצְדָקָ֖ה <WH6666> and justice מֵרָח֣וֹק <WH7350> afar off תַּעֲמֹ֑ד <WH5975> standeth כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for כָשְׁלָ֤ה <WH3782> is fallen בָֽרְחוֹב֙ <WH7339> in the street אֱמֶ֔ת <WH571> for truth וּנְכֹחָ֖ה <WH5229> and equity לֹא־ <WH3808> not תוּכַ֥ל <WH3201> cannot לָבֽוֹא׃ <WH935> enter

וַתְּהִ֤י <WH1961> become הָֽאֱמֶת֙ <WH571> Yea truth נֶעְדֶּ֔רֶת <WH5737> faileth וְסָ֥ר <WH5493> and he [that] departeth מֵרָ֖ע <WH7451> from evil מִשְׁתּוֹלֵ֑ל <WH7997> maketh himself a prey וַיַּ֧רְא <WH7200> saw יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> and the LORD וַיֵּ֥רַע <WH7489> displeasing בְּעֵינָ֖יו <WH5869> his sight כִּֽי־ <WH3588> that אֵ֥ין <WH369> there מִשְׁפָּֽט׃ <WH4941> him that [there was] no judgment

וַיַּרְא֙ <WH7200> And he saw כִּֽי־ <WH3588> that אֵ֣ין <WH369> there אִ֔ישׁ <WH376> that [there was] no man וַיִּשְׁתּוֹמֵ֖ם <WH8074> and wondered כִּ֣י <WH3588> for אֵ֣ין <WH369> was no מַפְגִּ֑יעַ <WH6293> that [there was] no intercessor וַתּ֤וֹשַֽׁע <WH3467> brought salvation לוֹ֙ זְרֹע֔וֹ <WH2220> therefore his arm וְצִדְקָת֖וֹ <WH6666> unto him and his righteousness הִ֥יא <WH1931> he סְמָכָֽתְהוּ׃ <WH5564> it sustained

וַיִּלְבַּ֤שׁ <WH3847> For he put on צְדָקָה֙ <WH6666> righteousness כַּשִּׁרְיָ֔ן <WH8302> as a breastplate וְכ֥וֹבַע <WH3553> and an helmet יְשׁוּעָ֖ה <WH3444> of salvation בְּרֹאשׁ֑וֹ <WH7218> upon his head וַיִּלְבַּ֞שׁ <WH3847> and he put on בִּגְדֵ֤י <WH899> the garments נָקָם֙ <WH5359> of vengeance תִּלְבֹּ֔שֶׁת <WH8516> [for] clothing וַיַּ֥עַט <WH5844> and was clad כַּמְעִ֖יל <WH4598> as a cloke קִנְאָֽה׃ <WH7068> with zeal

כְּעַ֤ל <WH5921> According to גְּמֻלוֹת֙ <WH1578> [their] deeds כְּעַ֣ל <WH5921> so יְשַׁלֵּ֔ם <WH7999> accordingly he will repay חֵמָ֣ה <WH2534> fury לְצָרָ֔יו <WH6862> to his adversaries גְּמ֖וּל <WH1576> recompence לְאֹֽיְבָ֑יו <WH341> to his enemies לָאִיִּ֖ים <WH339> to the islands גְּמ֥וּל <WH1576> recompence יְשַׁלֵּֽם׃ <WH7999> he will repay

וְיִֽירְא֤וּ <WH3372> So shall they fear מִֽמַּעֲרָב֙ <WH4628> from the west אֶת־ <WH853> שֵׁ֣ם <WH8034> the name יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD וּמִמִּזְרַח־ <WH4217> from the rising שֶׁ֖מֶשׁ <WH8121> of the sun אֶת־ <WH853> כְּבוֹד֑וֹ <WH3519> and his glory כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for יָב֤וֹא <WH935> shall come in כַנָּהָר֙ <WH5104> like a flood צָ֔ר <WH6862> When the enemy ר֥וּחַ <WH7307> the Spirit יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD נֹ֥סְסָה <WH5127> shall lift up a standard בֽוֹ׃

וּבָ֤א <WH935> shall come לְצִיּוֹן֙ <WH6726> to Zion גּוֹאֵ֔ל <WH1350> And the Redeemer וּלְשָׁבֵ֥י <WH7725> and unto them that turn פֶ֖שַׁע <WH6588> from transgression בְּיַֽעֲקֹ֑ב <WH3290> in Jacob נְאֻ֖ם <WH5002> saith יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD

וַאֲנִ֗י <WH589> I זֹ֣את <WH2063> likewise בְּרִיתִ֤י <WH1285> As for me this [is] my covenant אוֹתָם֙ <WH854> for אָמַ֣ר <WH559> with them saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD רוּחִי֙ <WH7307> My spirit אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which עָלֶ֔יךָ <WH5921> and וּדְבָרַ֖י <WH1697> that [is] upon thee and my words אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which שַׂ֣מְתִּי <WH7760> which I have put בְּפִ֑יךָ <WH6310> in thy mouth לֹֽא־ <WH3808> nor יָמ֡וּשׁוּ <WH4185> shall not depart מִפִּיךָ֩ <WH6310> out of thy mouth וּמִפִּ֨י <WH6310> nor out of the mouth זַרְעֲךָ֜ <WH2233> of thy seed וּמִפִּ֨י <WH6310> nor out of the mouth זֶ֤רַע <WH2233> of thy seed's זַרְעֲךָ֙ <WH2233> seed אָמַ֣ר <WH559> saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD מֵעַתָּ֖ה <WH6258> now וְעַד־ <WH5704> from henceforth and for עוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> ever ס
